data.description: DBI access to XML, CSV and other formats
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Umm, this module has been on CPAN over two years, if there's a
    reason it isn't registered, please let me know. I had correspondance
    with modules@perl.org long ago and the only changes (suggested by
    Tim Bunce) were made immediately.
